00020 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_GACTABLE_TRIES_H
00021 #define CONSTRAINT_GACTABLE_TRIES_H
00022 
00023 #include "tries.h"
00024 
00025 template<typename VarArray, int negative>
00026 struct GACTableConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00027 {
00028   virtual string constraint_name()
00029   { return "TableTrie"; }
00030   
00031   typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00032   VarArray vars;
00033   
00034   TupleTrieArray* tupleTrieArrayptr;
00035   
00036   //Following is setup globally in constraint to be passed by reference & recycled
00037   DomainInt* recyclableTuple;
00038   
00040   //   renamed off from current_support in case both run in parallel
00041   vector<TrieObj**> trie_current_support;
00042   
00044   BOOL check_tuple(const vector<int>& v)
00045   {
00046     for(unsigned i = 0; i < v.size(); ++i)
00047     {
00048       if(!vars[i].inDomain(v[i]))
00049         return false;
00050     }
00051     return true;
00052   }
00053     
00054   TupleList* tuples;
00055   
00056   GACTableConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj,const VarArray& _vars, TupleList* _tuples) :
00057     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), vars(_vars), tuples(_tuples)
00058   { 
00059     tupleTrieArrayptr = tuples->getTries();
00060     int arity = tuples->tuple_size();     
00061     D_ASSERT(_vars.size() == arity);
00062 
00063     trie_current_support.resize(tuples->literal_num); 
00064     for(int i = 0; i < tuples->literal_num; ++i)
00065     {
00066       trie_current_support[i] = new TrieObj*[arity];
00067       for(int j = 0; j < arity; j++)
00068         trie_current_support[i][j] = NULL;
00069     }
00070     // initialise supportting tuple for recycle
00071     recyclableTuple = new DomainInt[arity] ;
00072   }
00073   
00074   ~GACTableConstraint()
00075   {
00076     delete[] recyclableTuple;
00077     for(int i = 0; i < trie_current_support.size(); ++i)
00078       delete[] trie_current_support[i];
00079   }
00080   
00081   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00082   { return tuples->literal_num * ( vars.size() - 1) ; }
00083   
00084   BOOL find_new_support(int literal)
00085   {
00086      pair<int,int> varval = tuples->get_varval_from_literal(literal);
00087      int varIndex = varval.first;
00088      int val = varval.second;
00089      if(negative==0)
00090      {
00091          int new_support = 
00092            tupleTrieArrayptr->getTrie(varIndex).
00093                                 nextSupportingTuple(val, vars, trie_current_support[literal]);
00094          if (new_support < 0)
00095          { // cout << "find_new_support failed literal: " << literal << " var: " << varIndex << " val: " << get_val_from_literal(literal) << endl ;
00096              return false;
00097          }
00098      }
00099      else
00100      {
00101          int new_support = 
00102            tupleTrieArrayptr->getTrie(varIndex).
00103                                 nextSupportingTupleNegative(val, vars, trie_current_support[literal], recyclableTuple);
00104          if (new_support < 0)
00105          { // cout << "find_new_support failed literal: " << literal << " var: " << varIndex << " val: " << get_val_from_literal(literal) << endl ;
00106              return false;
00107          }
00108      }
00109          // cout << "find_new_support sup= "<< new_support << " literal: " << literal << " var: " << varIndex << " val: " << get_val_from_literal(literal) << endl;
00110          //trie_current_support[literal] = new_support; 
00111      return true;
00112   }
00113   
00114   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* propagated_trig)
00115   {
00116     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(DynGACTable);
00117     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00118     int trigger_pos = propagated_trig - dt;
00119     int propagated_literal = trigger_pos / (vars.size() - 1);
00120     
00121     BOOL is_new_support = find_new_support(propagated_literal);
00122 
00123     pair<int,int> varval = tuples->get_varval_from_literal(propagated_literal);
00124     int varIndex = varval.first;
00125     int val = varval.second;
00126     
00127     if(is_new_support)
00128     {
00129       setup_watches(varIndex, propagated_literal);
00130     }
00131     else
00132     {
00133       vars[varIndex].removeFromDomain(val);
00134     }
00135   }
00136   
00137   void setup_watches(int var, int lit)
00138   {
00139     // cout << "setup_watches lit= "<< lit << endl ; cout << "calling reconstructTuple from setup_watches" << endl ; 
00140     if(negative==0)
00141     {
00142         tupleTrieArrayptr->getTrie(var).reconstructTuple(recyclableTuple,trie_current_support[lit]);
00143     }
00144     // otherwise, the support is already in recyclableTuple. 
00145     
00146     // cout << "  " << var << ", literal" << lit << ":";
00147     // for(int z = 0; z < vars.size(); ++z) cout << recyclableTuple[z] << " "; cout << endl;
00148     
00149     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00150     
00151     int vars_size = vars.size();
00152     dt += lit * (vars_size - 1);
00153     for(int v = 0; v < vars_size; ++v)
00154     {
00155       if(v != var)
00156       {
00157         D_ASSERT(vars[v].inDomain(recyclableTuple[v]));
00158         vars[v].addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, recyclableTuple[v]);
00159         ++dt;
00160       }
00161     }
00162   }
00163   
00164   virtual void full_propagate()
00165   {
00166       if(negative==0 && tuples->size()==0)
00167       {   // it seems to work without this explicit check, but I put it in anyway.
00168           getState(stateObj).setFailed(true);
00169           return;
00170       }
00171       for(int varIndex = 0; varIndex < vars.size(); ++varIndex) 
00172       {
00173         if(negative==0)
00174         {
00175             vars[varIndex].setMin((tuples->dom_smallest)[varIndex]);
00176             vars[varIndex].setMax((tuples->dom_smallest)[varIndex] + (tuples->dom_size)[varIndex]);
00177         }
00178         
00179         if(getState(stateObj).isFailed()) return;
00180         
00181         DomainInt max = vars[varIndex].getMax();
00182         for(DomainInt i = vars[varIndex].getMin(); i <= max; ++i) 
00183         {
00184             if(i>= (tuples->dom_smallest)[varIndex] 
00185                 && i<=(tuples->dom_smallest)[varIndex] + (tuples->dom_size)[varIndex])
00186             {
00187                 int literal = tuples->get_literal(varIndex, i);
00188                 
00189                 int sup;
00190                 if(negative==0)
00191                 {
00192                     sup = tupleTrieArrayptr->getTrie(varIndex).       
00193                         nextSupportingTuple(i, vars, trie_current_support[literal]);
00194                 }
00195                 else
00196                 {
00197                     sup = tupleTrieArrayptr->getTrie(varIndex).       
00198                         nextSupportingTupleNegative(i, vars, trie_current_support[literal], recyclableTuple);
00199                 }
00200                 
00201                 //trie_current_support[literal] = sup;
00202                 // cout << "    var " << varIndex << " val: " << i << " sup " << sup << " " << endl;
00203                 if(sup < 0)
00204                 {
00205                   //cout <<"No valid support for " + to_string(i) + " in var " + to_string(varIndex) << endl;
00206                   //volatile int * myptr=NULL;
00207                   //int crashit=*(myptr);
00208                   vars[varIndex].removeFromDomain(i);
00209                 }
00210                 else
00211                 {
00212                   setup_watches(varIndex, literal);
00213                 }
00214             }
00215             else
00216             {
00217                 D_ASSERT(negative==1);
00218                 // else: if the literal is not contained in any forbidden tuple, then it is 
00219                 // not necessary to find a support for it or set watches. The else case
00220                 // only occurs with negative tuple constraints. 
00221             }
00222         }
00223       }
00224       // cout << endl; cout << "  fp: finished finding supports: " << endl ;
00225   }
00226   
00227   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00228   {
00229     if(negative==0)
00230     {
00231         for(unsigned i = 0; i < tuples->size(); ++i)
00232         {
00233           if( std::equal(v, v + v_size, (*tuples)[i]) )
00234             return true;
00235         }
00236         return false;
00237     }
00238     else
00239     {
00240         for(unsigned i = 0; i < tuples->size(); ++i)
00241         {
00242           if( std::equal(v, v + v_size, (*tuples)[i]) )
00243             return false;
00244         }
00245         return true;
00246     }
00247   }
00248   
00249   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00250   { 
00251     vector<AnyVarRef> anyvars;
00252     for(unsigned i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i)
00253       anyvars.push_back(vars[i]);
00254     return anyvars;
00255   }
00256   
00257   
00258 };
00259

00263 //GACTableCon(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& vars, TupleList* tuples)
00264 //{ return new GACTableConstraint<VarArray, 0>(stateObj, vars, tuples); }
00265 
00266 template<typename VarArray>
00267 AbstractConstraint*
00268 GACNegativeTableCon(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& vars, TupleList* tuples)
00269 { return new GACTableConstraint<VarArray, 1>(stateObj, vars, tuples); }
